createdBy.description: The user ID of the user who created the user-defined function.

createdDate.description: Timestamp of the creation of the user-defined function.

deleted.description: This variable indicates the deleted status of the user defined function component. If the value is true, it indicates the deletion of the referenced user-defined function. A false value indicates that the referenced user-defined function is not deleted and is available for use.

description.description: Optional. Additional details about the user-defined function component.

environmentMapExtensionId.description: The ID of an environment map extension. **Important:** This and other Environment Map Extension API objects require the client to know the ID of the environment map extension. In the user-defined function interface, click **Copy EME ID** to easily copy this ID for use in your API requests, or query the [Environment Map Extensions Summary object](/api/platformapi#tag/EnvironmentMapExtensionsSummary).

id.description: Required. Represents the unique, system-generated ID of the extended user-defined function.

modifiedBy.description: The user ID of the user who last updated the user-defined function.

modifiedDate.description: Timestamp of when the user-defined function was last updated.

name.description: Required. Represents the name of the user-defined function component.
